üÖ±Ô∏è  Starting the week with a new listing: $WEB3 is now live on Bidask!

$WEB3 is the utility token of the [WEB3 TON DNS Club](https://t.me/tondnsclub)  ecosystem, built on TON blockchain.

It‚Äôs designed for active TON users and .ton domain holders. Its core use case is for promoting and purchasing domains on the marketplace webdom.market, as well as participating in the WEB3 TON DNS Club community.

In the $WEB3 ecosystem, the token is used for:
üîò Paying fees and unlocking premium features on the domain marketplace
üîò Accessing private chats
üîò Paying for subscriptions to services and bots for domain management
üîò Advertising on the community channel and in domain sale/rental catalogs
üîò Providing liquidity to $WEB3 pools and earning rewards ‚Äî enabling passive income through token staking
üîò Playing in the web3lottery.top
$WEB3 has earned a place in the Open League Hall of Fame, winning prizes in the first three seasons!

Learn more about the project and token: web3ton.io

Stay updated with news and guides via the official channels:
RU: t.me/web3tonru
EN: t.me/web3ton
